apracsi.title: The Asia Pacific Research Association on Curriculum Studies, Inc. (APRACSI)
apracsi.about: The Asia Pacific Research Association on Curriculum Studies, Inc. (APRACSI) started as an initiative of a group of enthusiastic Curriculum Studies students, with help of their area adviser, in the University of the Philippines, Diliman, Quezon City early in 2017. The Asia Pacific Conference on Curriculum Studies and Instructional Designing (APCCSID) was the first focus of this group of people during that formative period, but seeing the need to establish a professional organization to anchor the future long term goals of the conference, the APRACSI was soon formed.

gk-usa.title: Gawad Kalinga - USA
gk-usa.about: Gawad Kalinga translated in English means 'to give care.' Its approach to attacking poverty began with building a cluster of homes in communities. Residents go through a values formation program that focuses on restoring dignity and self-worth. GK raises funds to help the marginalized build permanent homes with the latter contributing their sweat equity. GK opens access to education, more secure employment or livelihood opportunities and health and well-being.

csapi.title: Curriculum Studies Association of the Philippines Inc. (CSAPI)
csapi.about: The Curriculum Studies Association of the Philippines, Inc. (CSAPI) is a professional organization established to be the premier community of curriculum studies experts in the Philippines. The organization was established with the aim to promote the development and professionalization of curriculum studies in the Philippines.

cliqq.title: CLIQQ - Redesign
cliqq.about: CLiQQ Rewards is 7-Eleven's loyalty program. Customers Earn points by presenting a loyalty barcode every time they buy at 7-Eleven. (NOTE: This is not affiliated with Cliqq by 7-Eleven in any way. This purpose is only to enhance my design skills in mobile design by redesigning the current mobile application.)
